<table class = "page">

<tbody>

<tr>
  <td class = "smallpad">
  <div class = "r">
    Lodge By:
    <span class = "light"><br />(INCLUDE LOCATION)</span>
  </div>
  </td>
  <td><h2>SALMAT MOOREBANK</h2></td>
  <td>Office of <br />Lodgement</td>
  <td><h2>SWLF</h2></td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td colspan = "4" class = "shaded">
  <div class = "r">
    <h1>Unaddressed Mail Service</h1>
  </div>
  </td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td>
  <div class = "r">
    LOGDEMENT DATE
  </div
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3"> `r lodgementDate`</td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td> 
  <div class = "r">
    DELIVERY START DATE
  <div />
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3">`r startDate` TO `r endDate`</td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td>
  <div class = "r">
    ULD IDENTIFIER
  </div>
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3">`r nUld` OF `r totalUld`</td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td class = "sorting">
  <div class = "r">
    SORTING<br />DIVISIONS
    <br /><br />

    </span>
  </div>
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3"></td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td>
  <div class = "r">
    BOOKING ADVICE CODE
  </div>
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3">`r booking`</td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td>
  <div class = "r">
    DESTINATION
    <span class = "light">
      <br />All del centre or Mail Centre<br />
      (BRICK STACK)
    </span>
  </div>
  </td>
  <td colspan = "3"></td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td>
  <div class = "r">
    GROSS ULD<br />WEIGHT:
  </div>
  </td>

</tr>

</tbody>
</table>
